name: Barbara Butch
description: '''Leslie Barbara Butch''' (born 17 March 1981) is a French [[disc jockey]] and lesbian activist. She campaigns for [[Fat acceptance movement|fat acceptance]] and has made the short film ''Extra Large''. She was awarded the {{ill|Out d'or|fr}} 2021 "''personnalité LGBTI de l'année''" ("LGBTI personality of the year") by the French [[Association of LGBTI Journalists]]. In 2024, she was featured in the [[2024 Summer Olympics opening ceremony]], which was criticized as controversial due to a perceived mockery of Christianity.
